mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (id, pwd, name, phone, email, regdate, completed_todo, uncompleted_todo) values (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, now(), 0, 0)
mapper.select: select no, id, pwd, name, phone, email, regdate, completed_todo as completedTodo, uncompleted_todo as uncompleted_todo from tb_user
